skillValidationQuestions: I have worked with others to create a presentation.
I have worked with others to figure out how to solve a problem.
I have worked with others to complete a project.
I have effectively conveyed ideas and information in both written and verbal forms.
I have actively listened to others to understand their perspectives and needs.
I have provided clear and concise feedback to colleagues to improve collaboration.
I have created schedules and set deadlines to manage multiple responsibilities.
I have used tools and techniques to track progress and stay organized.
I have allocated time effectively to balance work, meetings, and personal tasks.
